context: Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnant,
review:
Dr. Padmapriya is an exceptional gynecologist who has been instrumental in my journey from pre-pregnancy to post-delivery care. Her kindness, ********* ********** *** unwavering reliability have left a lasting impression on me. During my pre-pregnancy consultations, she provided thorough guidance and support, ensuring I was well-prepared for the journey ahead.

When the time came for my dekivery, Dr. Padmapriya demonstrated remarkable expertise and professionalism. She ensured a smooth procedure, putting my mind at ease with her reassuring demeanor. Her attention to detail and commitment to patient care were evident throughout the entire process.

In post-delivery consultations, Dr. Padmapriya continued to excel. She attentively monitored my recovery and addressed any concerns with clarity and empathy. Her ability to explain complex medical information in a clear and understandable manner is truly commendable.

Overall, I am incredibly grateful to Dr. Padmapriya for her outstanding care and support. She not only possesses exceptional medical skills but also embodies the qualities of a compassionate healthcare provider.

I would highly recommend her to anyone seeking a gynecologist who goes above and beyond for their patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy care and management,
review:
I consulted Dr. Padmapriya mam during my pre and post pregnancy check ups. 
We used to visit the Kashyapa clinic between 6:30 to 8:00 PM and wait time was not much.
Doctor was very humble and used to explain everything neatly in visit each visit. All necessary diet, excercise, medicines and care to be taken was advised thoroughly.
Madam did the delivery of my baby girl and we both are doing super fine. 
Post delivery check ups are also done by madam. I strongly advise pregnant women looking for best gynecologist to consult Dr. Padmapriya for the diagnosis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I moved to Bangalore in my 6th month of pregnancy, I was worried about the doctor's change. We found Dr Padmapriya through practo and decided to visit her for initial consultation.¬†Our first visit with her went really well. We had booked an appointment in prior. No wait time, was allowed to meet the doctor at asked time. She welcomed us with a smile and took time to go through all my report done till date and made notes. She cleared all our queries and no false hope were given. We decided to continue with her. She was there throughout the pregnancy and post that too. Her expertise in this field made us feel comfortable and safe to ask any question without hesitation.She is very kind, listens to patients calmly and understands our situation as to-be-parents. She is always reachable.  Does not charge unnecessary nor does she suggest unwanted tests or scans. We had a very good experience and would highly recommend her. Thankyou doctor for all the support and to make this journey memorable for us ‚ù§Ô∏è.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
As a couple we had been to several doctors for pre- pregnancy counselling, but for some reason we found none so connected to understand the root of the concern as it was more to do with psychological connect than physical diagnosis. I got to know about the doctor from Practo app , and went for the consultation in Kashyap orthopaedic center in Navrang, the clinic is at prime location, very hygienic, not too crowded, friendly staff, minimal formalities to book an appointment. On our first visit we found the doctor was somebody whom we were looking for and gradually after few visits she helped us with prepregnancy counselling .

Only after conceiving, we got to know that she is a OBG surgeonüòÖ who delivers baby at top maternity hospitals, we were delighted to continue the Journey with her . She guided us with unbiased suggestions when asked for with regards to which hospital to go with as well. The pregnancy journey was very smooth, as we continued to consult her in the clinic ( who would unnecessary üßê pay extra to visit the same doc in maternity hospital) and we were blessed with baby girl üßíüèª.  Although the pregnancy had all green lights for vaginal birth, last moment the decision had to be made to go with caesarean and we are happy with the decision made and have no regrets. Mother and baby both are doing excellent.

@ Dr. Padmapriya: You really are awsomeü§© humanbeing first of all and our experience speaks how good you are as a doctor/surgeon.
Thanks üôèüèª for all the kind support till now and going forward. We really have become friends now and considered you as a family doctor üòÉand not just patientsüòâ 

We strongly recommend Dr. Padmapriya definitely üíØ if you want a doctor who connects very strongly with the patient which i feel is a very important characteristic to look for in a doctor by any patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We were blessed with a baby in February 2022 - our second baby. Dr. Padmapriya, Kashyap Women‚Äôs Clinic, Rajajinagar, was our gynecologist throughout the pregnancy and for the delivery.

Our first baby suffered from one of the rarest ailments. None of the pre-natal tests had revealed anything. After 2 months, baby had to succumb to the ailment. Moreover, the duration/time gap for the second pregnancy was well below the prescribed duration. So, this pregnancy was very crucial for us and, probably, challenging for gynaecologist also.

Dr Padmapriya went through the reports of our previous baby and accordingly, started the treatment. All through 3 trimesters, we were advised with necessary supplements and tests at appropriate intervals. Blood and urine tests were performed at Kashyap Women Clinic itself. Reception and lab staff were cooperative. Hygiene and maintenance was very impressive.

In addition to ultrasound scans, a few more ‚Äúspecial screening tests‚Äù at multiple institutions had to be done. This was to ensure that the baby is healthy and free from any kind of ailments. Moreover, Dr guided us through Covid vaccination and 3rd Covid wave (Omicron).

In each consultation, Dr. tried to understand and address our concerns. She listens. Always accessible over the phone. At times, she also had to even counsel us.

Doctor is a visiting/consultant gynaecologist at several hospitals. So, there was flexibility to choose the hospital for delivery. The delivery (c-section) process was planned and coordinated well.

Both mother and baby are doing good. In summary, we are very happy with our journey under Dr. Padmapriya's guidance. Grateful too. She is experienced, updated and approachable. From our experience, it will be always comforting and relieving when one is under her care.
reply_text:
Thank you for taking the time out to write this review Vidya and Nagesh !!

Happy to be a part of your Journey ! 

Happy parenting üòä

From the very first appointment, we were impressed by her professionalism, expertise, calmness.

Her approachability and friendly nature made us feel comfortable discussing the queries we had, which was incredibly reassuring which was needed during important and crucial times.

We truly appreciate and thankful to Dr. Padmapriya for her unwavering dedication and genuine care throughout the pregnancy journey. I can wholeheartedly recommend her to any expectant mother seeking a compassionate and knowledgeable gynaecologist for a positive birthing experience

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Family Planning,Pregnancy Tests,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review:
We consulted Dr.Padmapriya for pre pregnancy counselling in 2022, she cleared all our doubts ,suggested to take pre pregnancy vitals and we got pregnant in 2months
And then throughout 9months of journey we have consulted Dr.Padmapriya..she has all the patience to explain each and every detail about the scan,baby growth, medicine etc..
Even with her busy schedule she use to answer messages or phone call immediately.
We were keen to have normal delivery so Doctor suggested exercises,i was induced pain as i didn't get pain till last day, Doctor was there with us all time during delivery and she explained about epidural as i couldn't control pain after 10hours of labour,she encouraged both of us to try somemore time for normal delivery with epidural given, unfortunately baby didn't co-operate at the end and we opted for emergency c-section,in march 2023 we are blessed with baby boy.during labour Doctor was with us and i felt comfortable (like am with another family member) during the entire process.
Even after discharge from hospital i got UTI and doctor use to followup personally untill i got cured completely.she has arranged a nurse to inject antibiotics everyday at home.
We are thankful for you all time for the guidance,care,help and everything.
Doctor's commitment towards profession and her patience level to address each and every concerns of patients is highly appreciated.
Once again Thank you Doctor for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I would highly recommend and give a 5+ star to Dr. PadmaPriya. Very Professional and friendly.

First of all. Thank you very much Dr. PadmaPriyaüòä for all your guidance and support from Pregnancy thru Delivery. Both Mother and child are doing wonderful.
She is available 24/7 for any medical support one needs.
Initially there were some complications, Doc handled them so smoothly and efficiently that made our journey so tension less. She gives utmost importance and advices precautions for each and every deviated parameters of your medical reports so that there are no hiccups during pregnancy and delivery.
Small Story in our journey:
There was spotting issue around 10:30PM which is almost a sleeping time for most of us, But i could not avoid calling Dr.PadmaPriya, Guess what she answered the calling in only a couple of rings and immediately suggested medications on call. Her motivation and follow up vanished our sleepless nights.

Thank you so much Doctreüòäüòä

Regards,
Bhavana and Pramod

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was searching for a good women‚Äôs clinic, it so happened that I came across Kashyap and it was then newly opened about 2months old. I visited Dr.Padmapriya gynaecologist, I told her my issue and she was so pleasantly and patiently listening to mine and gave me few remedies of how I could improve on it.
What happened next was a miracle for me, after a month visit of mine, I tested positive with PREGNANCY üòÅ, this was such a bliss to me and my family. After all of that I went back to Dr. Padmapriya for my future regular consultations, it was all because of her that made my pregnancy in ease, she was always motivating, being very positive which is really important for any women to be during pregnancy.
The next thing was that I wanted her to be there and do my delivery, trust me it was worth and I had a successful delivery.
Also to mention the staff there are so cooperative, the maintenance of the environment is really good, they maintain hygiene.
I had a great  and successful experience.
I will recommend Kashyap clinic for any women‚Äôs issue and also any Orthopaedic problem because even though I haven‚Äôt visited Sir, I have seen many visiting him.
Thanks to Dr. Padmapriya and the entire team of Kashyap üòä.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I had visited to doctor for my pregnancy confirmation to till the delivery, I delivered my baby girl under Dr Padmapriya care (Kashyap Orthopedic and Women clinic). I would strongly recommend Dr Padmapriya for any issues related to Gynaecology. She is very friendly, soft spoken, highly care and mainly she explains the things very clearly. Her medications and diagnostic tests are also very much to the point - not too less or not too much. She is very supportive and also available and responsive on WhatsApp chat for pregnancy related doubts and Quires at any time. I got panic attack, during my pregnancy time I had infected from COVID-19 with heart pain and other issues related to COVID-19, I consulted Dr Padmapriya she took extreme care and monitored me and my baby very closely with supportive, this kind of supportive doctors are very rare during the COVID-19 time. I had admitted to hospital due to decrease in the level of amniotic fluid, immediately Dr Padmapriya was constantly monitoring my status from on duty doctors and she delivered my baby without nay complication and issue. I and my husband are extremely happy with her treatment and patience. I have strongly recommended everyone who are looking for Gynecologist. We are grateful for her medical expertise and precaution during my pregnancy. God bless to Dr Padmapriya for her great success.

context: Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Gynaecological Problem,
review: We are happy that we reached out to Dr. Padmapriya for my pregnancy journey of 9 months. She spoke to us with ease and had this ever smilling face always. Through the entire pregnancy she explained us, guided us so we could head towards a smooth delivery process. There's never been a day when she's not responded to my doubts and queries on Whatsapp and on phone calls! When we were heading close to term, she promptly monitored and On the day of hospitalization, she took special care to ensure I was comfortable at each juncture, when I thought the entire process was overwhelming, she motivated me, gave me a push, encouraged me that I'll be able to deliver baby smoothly.  My husband and I are ever grateful and thankful to her for making this experience so worthwhile.
